EmailTemplate.name: RE: Your MBO account is now active (1386020154.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Your MBO account is now active (1386020154.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Kevin, Glad to hear the NCOIC deal is done! Lane will get this order set up for you so we can start billing time against it, we will stand by for the DBT Data SOW. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: kvjacksn@gmail.com [mailto:kvjacksn@gmail.com] On Behalf Of Kevin L. Jackson Sent: Monday, December 02, 2013 3:20 PM To: Sara Conde; Lane Gilmore Subject: Re: Your MBO account is now active Sara,
Thank you very much. I just received the signed MBO agreement from Carl Schwab of NCOIC (attached). DBT Data promised to modify the contract and send the signed MBO agreement by late this afternoon.Lane,I look forward to working with you and will schedule a walk through with you soon.Kevin L. Jackson Technology Strategy Consulting Kevin@KevinLJackson.com <mailto:Kevin@KevinLJackson.com>Phone (703) 335-0830 <tel:%28703%29%20335-0830>Mobile (571) 294-1020 <tel:%28571%29%20294-1020>For an appointment go to http://www.vcita.com/v/kevinljackson <http://www.vcita.com/v/kevinljackson> http://www.KevinLJackson.com <http://www.KevinLJackson.com> http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kevin_L._Jackson <http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kevin_L._Jackson> www.linkedin.com/in/kjackson/ <http://www.linkedin.com/in/kjackson/> http://kevinljackson.blogspot.com/ <http://kevinljackson.blogspot.com/> http://kevinjackson.ulitzer.com/ <http://kevinjackson.ulitzer.com/> On Mon, Dec 2, 2013 at 12:10 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Kevin, Congrats on getting your account active! As Lane says below, she will be your new point of contact moving forward but since you have already introduced me to several clients that are still in progress I will remain your (and your client’s) point of contact for those engagements until they close. Please reach out to Lane for any new opportunities and operational questions. When in doubt, just send an email to both of us and we will sort it out. J I met with Lane and brought her up to speed where things stand at this point, so she is aware of the 10k payment coming in for the DBT retainer. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028 <tel:703.793.6028>f: 703.793.6068 <tel:703.793.6068>e: sconde@mbopartners.com From: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>] Sent: Monday, December 02, 2013 12:05 PM To: kevin@kevinljackson.com <mailto:kevin@kevinljackson.com> Subject: Your MBO account is now active Dear Kevin, Welcome to MBO Partners! Now that your Business Center is active with us, I would like to schedule a time to walk through the MBO system with you, please review my calendar at my.timedriver.com <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ8zAtRFu2aboVg9%5FdSG0CgTDX6krKUbIJDN6F62Jwxua29zHIE9%5FC2uw3KIWEXeSNgbzapaqcOvCXzCacvTAKwyyLvEYMvsiUx1JMj84aESoG4wXrwpX7y1WaiAFYuypOi%5FnGIJctQvPENkkwC4H8SRLXa1zbf7IQ9pCU2rPhHtTJl9K4nK%5FNdwgewU3303bfSH%2DpjdKyxibf4vq94Nx1kvYwvcT%5FiG2%2D8CL2vIHNy%2DDGipz5gNgJZCDpYWtk7ljOnrXhDVf4MFSOzoR4NlG4Z76QEmM%2D%2D/1gwVMIfFNB5OolA4%5F%5FWUJ73%5FnjHFNJuntvN%5FBvjtnfhr9BxPLeHELH77h9gMTooHRMKkCyEUQqpQ1TlIT6XHXoZNr9kLHUi4Qg%5FMgrHbe5xPKa5Qystz6oOT7XMcg%2Dilu13APEhLE1UpNyI%2C> to set up a convenient time for you. Should you have any additional questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me. Thank you,Lane GilmoreBusiness Manager Direct: 7037936289 <tel:7037936289> Toll Free: 800-556-0270 <tel:800-556-0270>MBO Partners13454 Sunrise Valley Dr., Ste 300Herndon, VA 20171]http://www.mbopartners.com <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ8zAtRFu2aboVg9%5FdSG0CgTDX6krKUbIJDN6F62Jwxua29zHIE9%5FC2uw3KIWEXeSNgbzapaqcOvCXzCacvTAKwyyLvEYMvsiUx1JMj84aESoG4wXrwpX7y1WaiAFYuypOi%5FnGIJctQvPENkkwC4H8SRLXa1zbf7IQ9pCU2rPhHtTJl9K4nK%5FNdwgewU3303bfSH%2DpjdKyxibf4vq94Nx1kvYwvcT%5FiG2%2D8CL2vIHNy%2DDGipz5gNgJZCDpYWtk7ljOnrXhDVf4MFSOzoR4NlG4Z76QEmM%2D%2D/1gwVMM7QNEZOogl76fOJI7v5kTDSadartLE4W6e538Qq5lxxebGdIHTOo%2DlbP5ZjX9iLNBJFVsJDxgENNraDdYpazsZfG0CmSTqnmoLMZZ9bWoJGz9hIyo%2DM2WwwrZjRthmfLQ%2C%2C>Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
